Safe travels, Sara -----Original Message----- From: Kimberly Brown (Faculty) [mailto:kbrown@ubalt.edu] Sent: Monday, July 23, 2012 9:21 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder Sara, What is the status of payment? I am traveling out of the country. The only thing I need to bill is Wed the 18th - 4 hours. The rest is zero. Can you do that for me? Thanks, Kim Sent from my iPhone On Jul 22, 2012, at 6:56 PM, "sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: > According to our records, there is no time entered in the period indicated for the following work order(s):> > Start Stop Work Order> 07/09/2012 07/15/2012 Legal and Related Policy Issues for Facial Recognition Tech.> > > > Click this link to go to login page: https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=TimeSheetEntry <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=TimeSheetEntry>> > This is a system generated email that you have requested by selecting it on the System Notification page.>
